column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went here on a Thursday evening with a couple of friends.  While the food was pretty good
column2: the service was very rushed.  The drinks always stayed full and the food came quickly
column3: but we felt like we were being rushed to get out of there (and there was no one waiting for a table
column4: so we weren't holding up anyone).  We were there only an hour.
